title: paysafecard
body:
hey guys can u help me !?
I wana buy RP by using paysafecard 
but on London we have £ and to buy RP on my account need Euro 
what happened if I buy with £ when they are Euro 
will work ??

replies.body: Hey, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for this specific case.  Our billing team can take a look and find some options for ya!
